article:
The 'Minor Theater', located at 1015 H Street in Arcata, California, is one of
the oldest buildings in the United States built for feature films that is still
open and showing movies. [http://cinematreasures.org/news/11272_0_1_0_C/ The
Minor Theater: The Oldest Movies-Only Theater in the United
States] [http://www.humboldtsentinel.com/060519k.htm The Minor as a
Major Player; Historic moviehouse alive with vivid color and rich
soundfield] It was the first building in Humboldt County to be built as a
"true movie theater." [http://www.northcoastjournal.com/012700/cover0127.ht-
ml#anchor565901 The Story of the Minor Theater]
categories: Cinemas and movie theaters in California
Buildings and structures in Arcata, California
